metadata.description: Developer and System Administrator CLI tools - including cloud providers, version control, configuration management, and system utilities
metadata.source: Docker Hub, GitHub, and official tool registries
notes: Includes cloud provider CLIs, DevOps tools, language runtimes, and system utilities
Tools with official Docker images are prioritized
System utilities may use Alpine/BusyBox-based images

dev_tools.name: AWS CLI
dev_tools.description: Command-line interface for Amazon Web Services.
dev_tools.notes: Requires AWS_PAGER= environment variable: docker run --rm -e AWS_PAGER= amazon/aws-cli help

dev_tools.name: Google Cloud SDK
dev_tools.description: Command-line interface for Google Cloud Platform services.

dev_tools.name: Azure CLI
dev_tools.description: Command-line interface for Microsoft Azure services.
dev_tools.notes: Image from Microsoft Container Registry

dev_tools.name: Terraform
dev_tools.description: Infrastructure as code tool for building, changing, and versioning cloud infrastructure.

dev_tools.name: Ansible
dev_tools.description: Automation platform for configuration management, application deployment, and task automation.

dev_tools.name: Docker
dev_tools.description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running containerized applications.

dev_tools.name: Git
dev_tools.description: Distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code.

dev_tools.name: GitHub CLI
dev_tools.description: Gh is GitHub on the command line It brings pull requests, issues, and other GitHub concepts to the terminal next to where you are already working with git and your code.

dev_tools.name: GitLab CLI
dev_tools.description: GitLab CLI tool for working with GitLab from the command line.

dev_tools.name: Node.js
dev_tools.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine for server-side applications.

dev_tools.name: Python
dev_tools.description: High-level, interpreted programming language with dynamic typing and automatic memory management.

dev_tools.name: Go
dev_tools.description: Statically typed, compiled programming language designed for simplicity and efficiency.

dev_tools.name: Rust
dev_tools.description: Systems programming language focused on safety, speed, and concurrency.

dev_tools.name: PHP
dev_tools.description: PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development.

dev_tools.name: Ruby
dev_tools.description: Dynamic, interpreted programming language with focus on simplicity and productivity.

dev_tools.name: Java (OpenJDK)
dev_tools.description: Open-source implementation of the Java Platform, Standard Edition - provides JDK for developing and running Java applications.

dev_tools.name: PostgreSQL
dev_tools.description: Advanced open-source relational database with strong standards compliance.

dev_tools.name: MySQL
dev_tools.description: Open-source relational database management system.

dev_tools.name: Redis
dev_tools.description: In-memory data structure store used as database, cache, and message broker.

dev_tools.name: MongoDB
dev_tools.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database with flexible schema.

dev_tools.name: Jenkins
dev_tools.description: Automation server for continuous integration and continuous delivery pipelines.

dev_tools.name: GitLab Runner
dev_tools.description: Run your CI/CD jobs and send the results back to GitLab.

dev_tools.name: Nginx
dev_tools.description: High-performance web server, reverse proxy, and load balancer.

dev_tools.name: Vault
dev_tools.description: Tool for managing secrets and protecting sensitive data.

dev_tools.name: Consul
dev_tools.description: Service mesh solution providing service discovery, configuration, and segmentation.

dev_tools.name: Packer
dev_tools.description: Tool for creating identical machine images for multiple platforms.

dev_tools.name: DigitalOcean CLI
dev_tools.description: Official command-line interface for DigitalOcean API - manages Droplets, Kubernetes clusters, databases, and cloud infrastructure.

dev_tools.name: Helm
dev_tools.description: Package manager for Kubernetes applications.

dev_tools.name: kubectl
dev_tools.description: Command-line tool for controlling Kubernetes clusters.

dev_tools.name: jq
dev_tools.description: Lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor.

dev_tools.name: yq
dev_tools.description: Portable command-line YAML, JSON, and XML processor using jq-like syntax for parsing and manipulating structured data.

dev_tools.name: curl
dev_tools.description: Command-line tool for transferring data with URLs - supports HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and many other protocols for data transfer.

dev_tools.name: wget
dev_tools.description: Network utility for non-interactive download of files from the web - supports HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP with resume capability.
dev_tools.notes: Using Alpine Linux which includes wget via BusyBox

dev_tools.name: htop
dev_tools.description: Interactive process viewer for Unix systems - provides real-time system monitoring with a user-friendly interface.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, not commonly containerized

dev_tools.name: tmux
dev_tools.description: Terminal multiplexer for Unix-like operating systems.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, not commonly containerized

dev_tools.name: vim
dev_tools.description: Highly configurable text editor built to make creating and changing any kind of text very efficient.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, not commonly containerized

dev_tools.name: Grafana
dev_tools.description: Analytics and monitoring platform with customizable dashboards.

dev_tools.name: Elasticsearch
dev_tools.description: Distributed search and analytics engine for full-text search.

dev_tools.name: Logstash
dev_tools.description: Server-side data processing pipeline for ingesting, transforming, and sending data.

dev_tools.name: Kibana
dev_tools.description: Data visualization and exploration platform for Elasticsearch.

dev_tools.name: MariaDB
dev_tools.description: Open-source relational database forked from MySQL with enhanced features.

dev_tools.name: RabbitMQ
dev_tools.description: Message broker implementing AMQP for reliable messaging between applications.

dev_tools.name: Memcached
dev_tools.description: High-performance, distributed memory object caching system.

dev_tools.name: Traefik
dev_tools.description: Modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer for microservices.

dev_tools.name: HAProxy
dev_tools.description: Reliable, high-performance TCP/HTTP load balancer - widely used for distributing traffic across multiple servers.

dev_tools.name: Caddy
dev_tools.description: Fast, multi-platform web server with automatic HTTPS.

dev_tools.name: Certbot
dev_tools.description: Tool for automatically obtaining and renewing Let's Encrypt SSL certificates.

dev_tools.name: Buildah
dev_tools.description: Tool that facilitates building OCI container images.

dev_tools.name: Skopeo
dev_tools.description: Command line utility for various operations on container images and image repositories.

dev_tools.name: Trivy
dev_tools.description: Comprehensive security scanner for vulnerabilities in containers and filesystems.

dev_tools.name: Grype
dev_tools.description: Vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems.
dev_tools.notes: Docker image has OCI runtime compatibility issues on some systems

dev_tools.name: Syft
dev_tools.description: Tool for generating Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from container images.

dev_tools.name: Dive
dev_tools.description: Tool for exploring Docker image layers and analyzing layer contents.

dev_tools.name: Hadolint
dev_tools.description: A smarter Dockerfile linter that helps you build best practice Docker images.

dev_tools.name: act
dev_tools.description: Run your GitHub Actions locally Why would you want to do this.

dev_tools.name: K9s
dev_tools.description: Terminal-based UI for managing Kubernetes clusters.

dev_tools.name: Kustomize
dev_tools.description: Kubernetes configuration customization tool using declarative specifications.

dev_tools.name: Kubectx + Kubens
dev_tools.description: Faster way to switch between clusters and namespaces in kubectl.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, shell scripts

dev_tools.name: Stern
dev_tools.description: Multi pod and container log tailing for Kubernetes.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used as binary on host system

dev_tools.name: fzf
dev_tools.description: Fzf is a general-purpose command-line fuzzy finder.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system for shell integration

dev_tools.name: ripgrep
dev_tools.description: Line-oriented search tool that recursively searches the current directory.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: bat
dev_tools.description: Cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: fd
dev_tools.description: Simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: exa
dev_tools.description: (This repository isn't archived because the only person with the rights to do so is unreachable). is a modern replacement for _ls_.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, project archived

dev_tools.name: Zoxide
dev_tools.description: Zoxide is a smarter cd command, inspired by z and autojump.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system for shell integration

dev_tools.name: HTTPie
dev_tools.description: Modern, user-friendly command-line HTTP client with intuitive syntax, JSON support, and colored output for testing APIs.
dev_tools.notes: Official Docker images have access restrictions; typically installed via pip

dev_tools.name: lazydocker
dev_tools.description: Terminal UI for managing Docker containers, images, and volumes.

dev_tools.name: lazygit
dev_tools.description: Lazygit is not my fulltime job but it is a hefty part time job so if you want to support the project please consider sponsoring me.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system for Git integration

dev_tools.name: Minio
dev_tools.description: High-performance object storage with S3-compatible API.

dev_tools.name: Rclone
dev_tools.description: Command-line program for syncing files and directories to cloud storage.

dev_tools.name: Restic
dev_tools.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program with encryption and deduplication.

dev_tools.name: borgbackup
dev_tools.description: Deduplicating archiver with compression and encryption.
dev_tools.notes: No official Docker image, typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: Etcd
dev_tools.description: Distributed, reliable key-value store for distributed systems configuration.

dev_tools.name: Nmap
dev_tools.description: Network discovery and security auditing tool.

dev_tools.name: Wireshark (tshark)
dev_tools.description: Wireshark is a network traffic analyzer, or "sniffer", for Linux, macOS, BSD and other Unix and Unix-like operating systems and for Windows.
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, GUI application

dev_tools.name: Netcat
dev_tools.description: Networking utility for reading and writing network connections.
dev_tools.notes: Included in most base images (Alpine, Ubuntu, etc.)

dev_tools.name: OpenSSH
dev_tools.description: List only allows posting from subscribed addresses.
dev_tools.notes: SSH client not included in base Alpine image; typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: OpenSSL
dev_tools.description: OpenSSL is a robust, commercial-grade, full-featured Open Source Toolkit for the TLS (formerly SSL), DTLS and QUIC protocols.
dev_tools.notes: Included in most base images

dev_tools.name: Sqlmap
dev_tools.description: Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool.
dev_tools.notes: Available Docker images use deprecated manifest format; typically installed via pip or package manager

dev_tools.name: Nuclei
dev_tools.description: Fast vulnerability scanner based on templates.

dev_tools.name: Subfinder
dev_tools.description: Subdomain discovery tool for penetration testing and bug bounty.

dev_tools.name: Dasel
dev_tools.description: Query and update data structures using selector syntax (JSON, YAML, TOML, XML).

dev_tools.name: Crane
dev_tools.description: Tool for interacting with remote container registries.
dev_tools.notes: Using GCR image instead of GHCR due to access restrictions

dev_tools.name: Cosign
dev_tools.description: Container image signing and verification tool.

dev_tools.name: Loki
dev_tools.description: Horizontally-scalable log aggregation system.

dev_tools.name: Promtail
dev_tools.description: Agent for shipping logs to Loki.

dev_tools.name: Benthos
dev_tools.description: Stream processor for mundane data processing tasks.

dev_tools.name: Gomplate
dev_tools.description: Template processor with support for multiple data sources.

dev_tools.name: Terraform-docs
dev_tools.description: Tool for generating documentation from Terraform modules.

dev_tools.name: Tflint
dev_tools.description: Linter for Terraform configurations focused on errors and best practices.

dev_tools.name: Terragrunt
dev_tools.description: Thin wrapper for Terraform providing extra tools for keeping configurations DRY.

dev_tools.name: Checkov
dev_tools.description: Static analysis tool for infrastructure-as-code security scanning.

dev_tools.name: Tfsec
dev_tools.description: Security scanner for Terraform code.

dev_tools.name: Infracost
dev_tools.description: Cost estimates for Terraform projects.

dev_tools.name: Pulumi
dev_tools.description: Infrastructure as code platform using familiar programming languages.
dev_tools.notes: Large image - first download may take longer than typical timeout
